item.title: By: RealAnthonySullivan

item.description: Good job and keep going. I'm at 7079 myself.
item.content:encoded: Good job and keep going. I’m at 7079 myself.

item.title: By: GADG3Tx87
item.dc:creator: GADG3Tx87
item.description:
Very good. Nice to see other people are trophy hunters too. Most think they are 'worthless' but I get satisfaction seeing my games complete. And it gives you something to keep playing for, this is the reason I still have a backlog on PS4, despite now having a backlog on PS5 too.
I just got my 100th Platinum last night. And a total count of 6230. On to the next milestone.
item.content:encoded:
Very good. Nice to see other people are trophy hunters too. Most think they are ‘worthless’ but I get satisfaction seeing my games complete. And it gives you something to keep playing for, this is the reason I still have a backlog on PS4, despite now having a backlog on PS5 too.

I just got my 100th Platinum last night. And a total count of 6230. On to the next milestone.

item.title: By: stardust-passing-by
item.dc:creator: stardust-passing-by
item.description: Just hit 8k myself a bit ago; keep it up! A fun feature I've found to motivate myself is TrueTrophies' trophy streaks (consecutive days you've earned a trophy.) Right now I'm at 45 days and 477 trophies earned.
item.content:encoded: Just hit 8k myself a bit ago; keep it up! A fun feature I’ve found to motivate myself is TrueTrophies’ trophy streaks (consecutive days you’ve earned a trophy.) Right now I’m at 45 days and 477 trophies earned.
